subTitle: Smart Attendance Tracking
title: Real-Time Worker Check-In & Check-Out System
desc: A digital system that allows construction workers to check in and check out using mobile devices or biometric authentication. It ensures accurate time tracking and reduces manual errors in attendance records.

subTitle: Automated Wage Calculation
title: Daily & Monthly Wage Processing
desc: Automatically calculates worker wages based on attendance, overtime, and predefined salary structures. The system minimizes payroll errors and ensures timely and transparent payments.

subTitle: Project-Based Workforce Monitoring
title: Multi-Site Worker Management
desc: Manage and monitor workers across multiple construction sites. Assign workers to projects, track their performance, and generate attendance reports for each site separately.

subTitle: Reports & Insights
title: Attendance & Payroll Analytics Dashboard
desc: Provides detailed reports and analytics on worker attendance, salary expenses, and productivity trends. Helps management make informed decisions with downloadable reports.
